level.heading: Funds not assignable or subject to execution.
level.text: Except as provided in ยง 1-529.01, none of the money mentioned in this subchapter, including any assets of the District of Columbia Police Officers and Fire Fighters' Retirement Fund, shall be assignable, either in law or equity, or be subject to execution of levy by attachment, garnishment, or other legal process except with respect to a domestic relations order that substantially meets all of the requirements of section 414(p) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as determined solely by the District of Columbia Retirement Board.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-314 added this section.
